DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the long-term effectiveness and safety of CP-690,550 for the treatment of rheumatoid arthritis. Subjects are only eligible for this study after they have completed participation in another "qualifying" study of CP-690,550.
DOC.brief_title: Long-Term, Open-Label Study Of CP-690,550 For Treatment Of Rheumatoid Arthritis In Japan
DOC.criteria: Subjects who have completed their participation in a randomized "qualifying" study of CP690,550 for the treatment of rheumatoid arthritis Serious medical conditions that would make treatment with CP690,550 potentially unsafe
DOC.keyword: Long term open label study in Japan
